glossary.def: A computer algorithm used to detect text reuse in the OpenITI Corpus.
The annotation system used on OpenITI texts, see the documentation for more details.

A plot that shows the distribution of data. The main box shows the central 50% of the data points (from the lower quartile to the upper quartile) and the central line gives the median. The outer 'whiskers' show 95% of the data points.
